title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: When navigating to the Project Properties Info page, the fields for Path, Type, etc. are currently displayed as editable text fields instead of labels.
EB: The fields for Path, Type, etc. should be displayed as readonly labels instead of editable text fields. This will improve the visual appearance of the page. It is possible that the fields were implemented as text fields so that their values can be selected and copied by the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue, select a Project, right-click and choose 'Properties' from the subsequent menu. On the Info page that opens, observe the fields for Path, Type, etc. which should be readonly labels instead of editable text fields.
